name: Ro Block's Happy Hood Game
description:
Shoot your enemies to hold down the Block!  Get as many as you can! Aim for the high score by taking out as many as possible.

My first game jam game I completed and first game I made entirely on my own.  It was a fun challenge and taught me a lot.  Expect more from me in the future!

The game jam was held by the Twitch streamer Moonmoon in May of 2021.
